Brief description: Movie rating dataset based on public and well-structured tweets
Creator: S. Dooms

Brief description: Tweet data from 2009 including original text, time stamp, user and sentiment.
Preprocessing: Classified using distant supervision from presence of emoticon in tweet.
Creator: A. Go et al.

Brief description: Twitter network data, not actual tweets. Shows connections between a large number of users.
Creator: R. Zafarani et al.

Preprocessing: Node features, circles, and ego networks.
Creator: J. McAuley et al.

Dataset Name: Twitter Dataset for Arabic Sentiment Analysis
Preprocessing: Samples hand-labeled as positive or negative.
Creator: N. Abdulla

Brief description: Data from Twitter and Tom's Hardware. This dataset focuses on specific buzz topics being discussed on those sites.
Preprocessing: Data is windowed so that the user can attempt to predict the events leading up to social media buzz.
Creator: F. Kawala et al.

Dataset Name: Paraphrase and Semantic Similarity in Twitter (PIT)
Brief description: This dataset focuses on whether tweets have (almost) same meaning/information or not. Manually labeled.
Preprocessing: tokenization, part-of-speech and named entity tagging
Creator: Xu et al.

Brief description: This dataset contains tweets during different news events in different countries. Manually labeled location mentions.
Preprocessing: location annotations added to JSON metadata
Creator: S.E. Middleton et al.
